languages.text: "Будет сделано, Ваша Светлость. Осмелюсь обратить ваше внимание, что заготовленная к экспедиции экипировка для Вашей Светлости и свиты приведена в порядок и может быть использована по первому повелению".

"As you command, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If I may just point out, the expedition equipment prepared in advance for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and your retinue has been maintained well and is ready for use at your order."
languages.original_text: "Будет сделано, Ваша Светлость. Осмелюсь обратить ваше внимание, что заготовленная к экспедиции экипировка для Вашей Светлости и свиты приведена в порядок и может быть использована по первому повелению".

traits.locale_text: "I'll see to it, your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I dare to point out that the expedition equipment prepared in advance for your Lordship/Ladyship and your retinue has been maintained well and is ready to use as soon as you order to."

"I'll see to it, your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I dare to point out that the expedition equipment prepared in advance for your Lordship/Ladyship and your retinue has been maintained well and is ready to use as soon as you order to."

"I'll see to it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I will point out that the expedition equipment prepared in advance for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and your retinue has been maintained well and is ready to use as soon as you order to."

"I'll see to it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I will point out that the expedition equipment prepared in advance for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and your retinue has been maintained well and is ready to use as soon as you order to."

"As you command, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If I may just point out, the expedition equipment prepared in advance for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and your retinue has been maintained well and is ready for use at your order."

languages.text: “遵命，大人。还有件事情想告知您，您和您的随行人员的探险装备都已经提前准备好了，您的随行人员也已经整装待发。只要您一声令下，就可以立即出发。”
languages.original_text: "As you command, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If I may just point out, the expedition equipment prepared in advance for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and your retinue has been maintained well and is ready for use at your order."

traits.locale_text: “遵命，大人。还有件事情想告知您，您和您的随行人员的探险装备都已经提前准备好了，您的随行人员也已经整装待发。只要您一声令下，就可以立即出发。”

languages.text: « À vos ordres, Votre Seigneurie. Permettez-moi de préciser que le matériel d'expédition préparé pour vous et votre entourage a été soigneusement entretenu et reste à votre disposition. »
languages.original_text: "As you command, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If I may just point out, the expedition equipment prepared in advance for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and your retinue has been maintained well and is ready for use at your order."

traits.locale_text: « À vos ordres, Votre Seigneurie. Permettez-moi de préciser que le matériel d'expédition préparé pour vous et votre entourage a été soigneusement entretenu et reste à votre disposition. »

languages.text: "Wie Ihr befehlt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich darf darauf hinweisen, dass die Expeditionsausrüstung Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} und Euer Gefolge bereitstehen und einsatzbereit sind, sobald Ihr es anordnet."
languages.original_text: "As you command, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If I may just point out, the expedition equipment prepared in advance for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and your retinue has been maintained well and is ready for use at your order."

traits.locale_text: "Wie Ihr befehlt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich darf darauf hinweisen, dass die Expeditionsausrüstung Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} und Euer Gefolge bereitstehen und einsatzbereit sind, sobald Ihr es anordnet."

"Ich kümmere mich darum, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich will darauf hinweisen, dass die Expeditionsausrüstung Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} und Euer Gefolge bereitstehen und einsatzbereit sind, sobald Ihr es anordnet."

languages.text: «Como ordene, {mf|milord|milady}. Me permito recordarle que su equipo de expedición y el de su séquito, que ya ha sido preparado con antelación, ha recibido el correcto mantenimiento y está listo para su uso en cuanto decida».
languages.original_text: "As you command, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If I may just point out, the expedition equipment prepared in advance for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and your retinue has been maintained well and is ready for use at your order."

traits.locale_text: «Como ordene, {mf|milord|milady}. Me permito recordarle que su equipo de expedición y el de su séquito, que ya ha sido preparado con antelación, ha recibido el correcto mantenimiento y está listo para su uso en cuanto decida».

languages.text: 「ご命令のままに、陛下。申し上げますと、陛下と陛下の従者のために事前に用意された遠征装備は、よく整備されており、いつでもご使用いただける状態にあります」
languages.original_text: "As you command, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If I may just point out, the expedition equipment prepared in advance for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and your retinue has been maintained well and is ready for use at your order."

traits.locale_text: 「ご命令のままに、陛下。申し上げますと、陛下と陛下の従者のために事前に用意された遠征装備は、よく整備されており、いつでもご使用いただける状態にあります」

languages.text: "Emredersiniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Müsaadenizle bir şeyi belirtmek isterim. Zatıaliniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ve maiyeti için hazırlanan keşif ekipmanları bakımlı ve kullanıma hazır vaziyette."
languages.original_text: "As you command, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If I may just point out, the expedition equipment prepared in advance for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and your retinue has been maintained well and is ready for use at your order."
